articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Still no AI-powered, ‘more personalized’ Siri from Apple at WWDC 25 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple announced a slew of updates at the Worldwide Developer Conference with one notable exception. It still hasn't revealed its previously announced AI-powered Siri.
articles.content: At this year’s Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC 25), Apple announced a slew of updates to its operating systems, services, and software, including a new look it dubbed “Liquid Glass” and a rebra… [+2744 chars]
